text: Events from the year 1998 in Argentina ==Incumbents== * President: Carlos Menem * Vice president: Carlos Ruckauf ==Events== *12 April - The 1998 Argentine Grand Prix is held at Autódromo Oscar Alfredo Gálvez in Buenos Aires, and is won by Michael Schumacher. *12 September - The Argentina national rugby union team plays the first match in its tour of Japan and Europe. ==Deaths== *3 May - René Mugica, actor, film director and screenwriter (born 1909) *17 October - Antonio Agri, violinist, composer and conductor (born 1932) ==See also== *List of Argentine films of 1998 ==References== ==External links== Category:Years of the 20th century in Argentina Argentina Category:1990s in Argentina Argentina
title: 1998 in Argentina
